title: Lands in Love - Tierras Enamoradas
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, International, Buffet, Beer/Wine, Israeli
description: Hotel, vegetarianrestaurant, adventure center, and travel planning of all the attractions in Costa Rica. Wide variety of unique dishes include lafa wrap, protein dish, desserts, and endless shake combinations. Location is 45 minute drive from Arenal volcano.
streetAddress: Route 272, from San Ramon to La Fortuna, 32km from San Ramon, 1km to the right
